name: Clandestiny (itch)
description:
Press Start or Enter to join the game.

4 player split screen with keyboard and xbox controls.

Search the crates for 3 diamonds and escape the dungeon before time runs out.

Place bombs in doors and crates to explode players. Using a shield will disarm the traps.

Controls

  • Left Joystick - Move
  • Right Joystick - Aim
  • Left Trigger - Dive
  • Left Shoulder - Climb
  • Right Trigger - Shoot
  • A Button - Search / Use
  • D-Pad Left & Right - Select Item
  • Left Joystick Press - Movement Boost
  • X Button - Reload
  • Y Button - Toggle FPV (Experimental)
